sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-aside :style="{width:asideWidth+'px'}" class="aside">
        <el-radio-group v-model="isCollapse" style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
            <el-radio-button @click="open" :value="false"><el-icon><Open /></el-icon></el-radio-button>
            <el-radio-button @click="close" :value="true"><el-icon><TurnOff /></el-icon></el-radio-button>
        </el-radio-group>
        <el-menu default-active="2" class="el-menu-vertical-demo" :collapse="isCollapse" @open="open"
            @close="close">
            <el-menu-item index="1">
                
            </el-menu-item>
            <el-menu-item index="2">
                <el-icon><icon-menu /></el-icon>
                <!-- <template #title>Navigator Two</template> -->
            </el-menu-item>
            <el-menu-item index="3" >
                <el-icon>
                    <document />
                </el-icon>
                <template #title>Navigator Three</template>
            </el-menu-item>
            <el-menu-item index="4">
                <el-icon>
                    <setting />
                </el-icon>
                <template #title>Navigator Four</template>
            </el-menu-item>
        </el-menu>
    </el-aside>
</template>
<script>
import { ref } from 'vue'

export default {
    setup() {
        let isCollapse = ref(true);
        let widasideWidth = ref(200);
        function close() {
            // isCollapse = false;
            asideWidth = 60;
            console.log(width)
        }
        function open() {
            // isCollapse = true;
            widasideWidth = 200
        }
        return {
            asideWidth,
            isCollapse,
            close,
            open
        }
    },
}
</script>
<style>
/* .el-menu-vertical-demo:not(.el-menu--collapse) {
    width: 200px;
    min-height: 400px;
} */
</style>
